attributes.action: Re-evaluate the A303 tunnel plan that currently threatens Stonehenge
attributes.additional_details: The A303 tunnel plan near Stonehenge will obliterate much of the archaeological significance in the area, as well as damaging much of the monument's cultural beauty. This should not be allowed; Stonehenge is a significant part of our country's history and culture, and therefore it must be protected from harm by our country's representatives.
attributes.background: The plan for the A303 tunnel must be re-evaluated in order to preserve this national monument's archaeological significance and its cultural beauty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560496
